text:
The history of social media begin in the 2000s. Thus, the social media are very recent. Facebook is the first active social media in 2004 and was successful from the start. Now, my generation use other social media like Instagram, twitter or LinkedIn. The climb of social media took several years, but it was a reel success and it continue today.
 In my opinion, social media are a pretty good invention and allow to communicate with other people. It became necessary in our life. But, at what price ? I couldn't tell you I'm not using social media, however, I'm against the mass use of social media.  I don't like the overexposure of the social media. I really don't understand the need of explain his life to other people in a public platform. It's dangerous and not useful. You can take pictures for you and don't post it for exemple. That's why I do ! And I'm very happy to keep my life for me and my family. Everybody is free to share or not, but according to me, we have to be careful with that.  Everybody is not benevolent and nice with others. Thus, they can be jealous. Moreover, social media is not reel life. Indeed, people want to show the best of us. Thus, they pay attention to the angle of the picture or the beauty of they skin etc etc. According to me, social media is just important to show what cool you are in the society, but is that the most important in life ? I'm not really sure of this. However, I can't lying and tell you I don't use social media. I just follow my friends and some people who inspired me. I keep in my head that this is not the real life.
